import './App.css'; import React from 'react' import { Chart } from "react-google-charts"; import fulldata2008 from './data/fulldata2008.json' function App() { const [selectCity, setSelectCity] = React.useState("") let state = ["Andhra Pradesh", "Arunachal Pradesh", "Assam", "Bihar", "Chhattisgarh", "Goa", "Gujarat", "Haryana", "Himachal Pradesh", "Jammu and Kashmir", "Jharkhand", "Karnataka", "Kerala", "Madhya Pradesh", "Maharashtra", "Manipur", "Meghalaya", "Mizoram", "Nagaland", "Odisha", "Punjab", "Rajasthan", "Sikkim", "Tamil Nadu", "Telangana", "Tripura", "Uttarakhand", "Uttar Pradesh", "West Bengal", "Andaman and Nicobar Islands", "Chandigarh", "Dadra and Nagar Haveli", "Daman and Diu", "Delhi", "Lakshadweep", "Puducherry"] console.log(fulldata2008) function handleChange(e) { setSelectCity(e.target.value) } console.log(selectCity) return (
); } export default App;
